about_the_game:
Project Utgardr is a first-person parkour platform adventure inspired by Norse and pre-Viking culture.

Adventuring amidst the mountains of her homeland, Thyra finds a fissure that mysteriously appeared on a cliff face and a hidden passage that crumbles behind her as she passes through it.
Thyra, now trapped in uncharted territory and searching for a way home, quickly gets her bearings in the arduous environment using her climbing abilities, discovering timeworn engravings and weathered altars.
Coming across an ancient, forgotten tale, Thyra discovers her role in it and follows its fragments to reveal its secret.

ᚱ - The Unexpected Journey of a Young Norse Woman

Explore breathtaking landscapes and perilous precipices on a homeward journey after being suddenly stranded in a forgotten corner of ancient Scandinavia.

ᚱ - Intuitive Parkour and Platforming

Take advantage of Thyra’s parkour abilities to traverse the crumbling road. Sprint through various environments and overcome different obstacles.

ᚱ - Flashes of Norse Culture

The ancient runes carved on the hidden crags point towards the right path and abandoned shrines built by an old Norse civilization centuries ago.

ᚱ - Unseen Forces Guide You

Follow shards of a lost myth chiseled into the face of the mountain and discover its secret. Locate strange glowing flowers and pray to the Horgr scattered all over for a safe haven. Something seems keen to help you on this journey…
detailed_description:
project utgardr chapters

Project Utgardr will include:

  • CHAPTER 1 (2025)

  • CHAPTER 2 (2025)

  • CHAPTER 3 (2025)

Project Utgardr currently includes:

  • CHAPTER 1 (Preview)

Chapters will be included in the game and they will not be sold separately.
Just before each full chapter's release, the game price will be increased by approximately 10-20%.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Linux
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2300 (2.80 GHz) or AMD FX-8120 (2.80 GHz)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred), HDD (Supported), 720p/30 fps, Low Quality Settings
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Linux
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600 (3.2Ghz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 1070 or Radeon™ RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD, 1080p/60 fps, High Quality Settings

name: Project Utgardr

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2300, AMD FX-8120 or any 2.40 GHz Quad-core processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ R9 285
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred), HDD (Supported), 1080p/30 fps, Low Quality Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2300, AMD FX-8120 or any 2.40 GHz Quad-core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 1070 or Radeon™ RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD, 1080p/60 fps, High Quality Settings

short_description: Explore ancient Scandinavian mountains as a young Norse woman, use your parkour skills to find a way home, and discover the mystery behind a forgotten myth scrawled all over the mountain range.
